name: AzureAppConfigurationImport
description: Import settings from configuration files into Azure App Configuration through build or deployment pipelines
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Subscription for the Azure App Configuration instance.

inputs.name: AppConfigurationEndpoint
inputs.label: App Configuration Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the endpoint of an existing [Azure App Configuration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-app-configuration/concept-key-value).

validation.message: Provide a valid app configuration endpoint.

inputs.name: ConfigurationFile
inputs.label: Configuration File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: the path to the configuration file (supported: yaml, json, properties)

inputs.name: UseFilePathExtension
inputs.label: Use the file path extension to determine the file format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether or not to use the file path extension to determine the file format

inputs.name: FileFormat
inputs.label: File Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: The configuration file format. If no format is provided, then the format defaults to the file extension of the configuration file provided.

validation.message: Supported file formats are: Yaml, Json, and Properties

inputs.name: Separator
inputs.label: Separator
inputs.helpMarkDown: Separator used to flatten the configuration file (json & yaml files). It is required when the depth provided is greater than 1

inputs.name: Depth
inputs.label: Depth
inputs.helpMarkDown: max depth to flatten to in configuration file (json and yaml files)

inputs.name: Prefix
inputs.label: Prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: a prefix to append to all keys in the configuration file

inputs.name: Label
inputs.label: Label
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies which label should be used when selecting key-values from App Configuration. If no label is provided then key-values with the _null_ label will be retrieved. The following characters are not allowed: `,` `*`.

inputs.name: ContentType
inputs.label: Content Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: a content type to append to all keys in the configuration file

inputs.name: Tags
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies one or more tag that should be added to key-value settings being imported to App Configuration. Tags should be of a valid JSON format and can span multiple lines. Example: {"tag1": "value1", "tag2": "value2"}

inputs.name: ExcludeFeatureFlags
inputs.label: Exclude feature flags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether or not any feature flags provided in the configuration file will be imported to App Configuration.

inputs.name: Strict
inputs.label: Delete key-values that are not included in the configuration file
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The behavior of this option depends on the configuration file's content profile.
 'Default': Any key-values in the store with the specified prefix and label that are not included in the configuration file will be deleted. 
'KVSet': Any key-values in the store that are not included in the configuration file will be deleted.

inputs.name: DryRun
inputs.label: Dry run
inputs.helpMarkDown: When dry run is enabled, this task will not perform any updates to App Configuration. Instead, any updates that would have been performed in a normal run will be printed to the console for review

inputs.name: ImportMode
inputs.label: Import Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Determines the behavior when importing key-values. The default value, 'All' will import all key-values in the input file to App Configuration. 'Ignore-Match' will only import settings that have no matching key-value in App Configuration.
